mil5.1.10:1.2: ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
mil5.1.10:1.6: ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita …pe… kappavasesam va’ti, tena hi temasaparicchedo miccha.
mil5.1.10:1.8: ‘ito tinnam masanam accayena tathagato parinibbayissati’ti, tena hi ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita …pe… kappavasesam va’ti tampi vacanam miccha.
mil5.1.10:1.11: Ayampi ubhato kotiko panho gambhiro sunipuno dunnijjhapayo tavanuppatto, bhindetam ditthijalam, ekamse thapaya, bhinda paravadan”ti.
mil5.1.10:2.1: “Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita …pe… kappavasesam va’ti, temasaparicchedo ca bhanito, so ca pana kappo ayukappo vuccati.
mil5.1.10:2.2: Na, maharaja, bhagava attano balam kittayamano evamaha, iddhibalam pana, maharaja, bhagava parikittayamano evamaha—
mil5.1.10:2.3: ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita …pe… kappavasesam va’ti.
mil5.1.10:3.1: Yatha, maharaja, ranno assajaniyo bhaveyya sighagati anilajavo, tassa raja javabalam parikittayanto sanegamajanapadabhatabalabrahmanagahapatikaamaccajanamajjhe evam vadeyya ‘akankhamano me, bho, ayam hayavaro sagarajalapariyantam mahim anuvicaritva khanena idhagaccheyya’ti, na ca tam javagatim tassam parisayam dasseyya, vijjati ca so javo tassa, samattho ca so khanena sagarajalapariyantam mahim anuvicaritum.
mil5.1.10:3.2: Evameva kho, maharaja, bhagava attano iddhibalam parikittayamano evamaha, tampi tevijjanam chalabhinnanam arahantanam vimalakhinasavanam devamanussananca majjhe nisiditva bhanitam—
mil5.1.10:3.3: ‘tathagatassa kho, ananda, cattaro iddhipada bhavita bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha, so akankhamano, ananda, tathagato kappam va tittheyya kappavasesam va’ti.
mil5.1.10:3.4: Vijjati ca tam, maharaja, iddhibalam bhagavato, samattho ca bhagava iddhibalena kappam va thatum kappavasesam va, na ca bhagava tam iddhibalam tassam parisayam dasseti, anatthiko, maharaja, bhagava sabbabhavehi, garahita ca tathagatassa sabbabhava.
mil5.1.10:3.7: evameva kho aham, bhikkhave, appamattakampi bhavam na vannemi antamaso accharasanghatamattampi’ti api nu kho, maharaja, bhagava sabbabhavagatiyoniyo guthasamam disva iddhibalam nissaya bhavesu chandaragam kareyya”ti?
mil5.1.10:3.9: “Tena hi, maharaja, bhagava iddhibalam parikittayamano evarupam buddhasihanadamabhinadi”ti.
